name: Diving Trunks
description: Trunks the elephant has dropped his peanuts overboard. Help him retrieve as many peanuts as possible from the deep ocean whilst avoiding unkindly marine creatures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any DirectX 9 compatible
